Reviews.Title: junk....
Reviews.Author: Joseph D. Kniesner
Reviews.Content: Ended up with one of these because someone put a password on it and forgot it. FYI if this happens to you get the software from the website put it on SD card and power on, reflash OS image...takes about 3 minutes. Phone tech support goes straight to voice mail no matter what option you pick and it comes with a quick start guide and no manual so trying to fix issues is like walking around a unfamiliar room with the lights out. I suggest two alternatives to buying this you can find a decent used laptop about 4 years old for around 100 dollars that will be able to run windows xp and have 5x the specs of this "netbook" or another thing if you have 100 dollars to use for entertainment google origami and you will find lots of fun ways to fold the 100 dollar bill into neat shapes this will make your money last longer and save you a few headaches.

Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: Caroline D. Robert "bookworm"
Reviews.Content: This little netbook was a huge disappointment.  Which is sad to say when I expected so little.  Just wanted something for my daughter to access her Facebook and play youtube videos on primarily, which is well within the realm of what this was advertised to do.Well it has a little youtube icon but it did not even have the capability to play all you tube videos so it has been sitting unused for six months.  Today I decided I may give it to my nine year old.  It was unresponsive after it loaded up so I restarted it and it came up with the screen saying loading OS image and never loaded.  So I did a web search and there are tons of people with this same problem.  You have to reload the operating system but since it has no drive to load it from and you can't do it from the USB you have to purchase a large enough SD card, download it on your laptop, transfer it to the SD card and then load the new OS onto the netbook.Major pain for something which was probably used six hours.  And it looks like there are a lot of people doing it.  I am sure there are more reliable netbooks out there.

Reviews.Title: Save your money...
Reviews.Author: h3ll0ash13
Reviews.Content: My son received this as a Christmas present from his grandparents. At first glance, it seems like a neat little netbook. It's more like a cell phone than a netbook. It runs Win CE, and it's faster than expected. You can't use flash on it though, which is a major downfall for a kid (most kid's websites are flash-based).My son was ecstatic upon opening. He couldn't wait to try it out. It connected quickly to our wi-fi with no problems. The wall charger is VERY short though, so he didn't want to sit next to the wall to play. It took almost all night to charge it! He wanted to use it the next morning - it was fully charged and lasted about 25-30 minutes. We updated the software on it (via the company's website) in hopes to help with the battery issue. It actually made it worse! The computer fails to keep time after the battery dies, and it would erase the settings we had in it (some trivial things, like my son's wallpaper and name, some more important things like the wi-fi network information).He used it maybe 5 or 6 times since Christmas. He asked to use it a couple of days ago, I plugged it in and it wouldn't charge. I left in plugged up for about an hour and still nothing. My husband inspected everything - nothing seemed to be wrong. I found my receipt and returned it to the store. I was ready for a fight, but the manager stated that 90% of the netbooks sold were returned for the same reason.In conclusion, this is actually a neat idea, but this netbook fell WAY short of expectations. Save your money, put down a little more, and buy an actual netbook instead!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Emanuele Rodriguez "Emanuele Rodriguez"
Reviews.Content: If you are expecting a full on PC that you can use in place of your home computer, than don't buy this.  If you want to check your email, search the web, an do basic things, this is great.  If people don't know how to connect to the Wi-Fi, maybe the should take a PC course, because it is incredibly easy.

Reviews.Title: Dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This unit did not work on arrival. There was not any warranty information or instructions how to return it to manufacturer .

Reviews.Title: Sylvania
Reviews.Author: Laura Fanea
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I needed, extremely practical. It is very easy to carry with you when travelling or even every day. It very easily fits into your hand bag and it is very light.

Reviews.Title: great for younger kids
Reviews.Author: kara oberry
Reviews.Content: nice, portable easy to set parental controlls,,,just perfect for my 8 yr old son. Easy for them to use ,,portable,,and just enough computer to keep him busy.

Reviews.Title: Not even a good toy!!
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: The average computer user will not get this item to work -- after a mystery tour of the interent (which warned against buying the product) a software upgrade was found that allowed the unit to hook up to a local wireless signal. But even at the lowest possible level graphics, page loading took "minutes" each page -- useless is my evaluation.

Reviews.Title: Will not connect to the internet
Reviews.Author: Paul MR "Ordinary user - no expert"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, this turd never would perform its basic function: wireless connection to the internet.  It does not even try to locate a network.  The digitalgadgets' customer service number goes straight to voicemail box.  No human is ever available.  Further, the netbook's battery was drained after just 1.5 hours of seeing what it could actually do, like playing solitaire.  It's going back to the seller today.

Reviews.Title: Right product for the right price
Reviews.Author: Dmitry Churilov
Reviews.Content: Well, there is nothing fancy about this product but for $90 to have fully functioning "almost" laptop isn't a bad deal

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Mike, Ga.
Reviews.Content: Just awful i mean useless product!Not the seller just the product i tried to use the internet  but it freeze up restart nothing helps the problem is it doesn't have the memory to run the operating system.

Reviews.Title: Awful product with no customer service
Reviews.Author: L. Paoni
Reviews.Content: We got this for Christmas and weren't expecting much.  However, it didn't work.  It didn't keep a connection online and 3 keys on the keyboard typed incorrectly. We left a voice message with no return call.  We sent an email with no answer.  Thankfully, Toys R Us gave us a refund.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: glendaandrobert
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time or money if you are looking for a great toy for your 9 year old daughter keep looking

Reviews.Title: How slow can you go?
Reviews.Author: Pittsburgh Mom
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Sylvania netbook for my 11 year-old son for Christmas.  Had absolutely no problem connecting this up to our wireless network - was quite simple.  However, I'm with some of the other reviewers, this product does not operate as advertised.  Dispite the YouTube desktop icon and logo on the product's packaging, you cannot utilize it for interacting on facebook.  It is very slow in processing requests.  I also echo another reviewer's comments on the way the netbook's surface retains finger prints - and no amount of cleaning elimiantes them.  I am returning to Kmart - where I purchased - and am ordering my son a refurbished laptop.  One good thing - I'm feeling good about my bargin shopping abilities as the price I paid ($79 on Thanksgiving Day) - seems like the best price I've seen quoted in the reviews posted.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Brian Barnett
Reviews.Content: Piece of Crap!!! Wil not download even the programs that are supposedly compatible with the windows crap edition operating system. It is functional but if you buy one of these make sure it has the android os on it

Reviews.Title: Worst Customer Service EVER
Reviews.Author: M. Robles
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of this netbooks for my son as a Christmas gift. What a headache!!!! I was never able to connect it to my home network (and I am very techy!). I spent 5 days trying to reach Customer Support through the phone, email and voice mail to no avail. I returned it. Do your homework, google 7" Sylvania to see for yourself all the problems this little brick has.

Reviews.Title: this unit is a piece of garbage!!!
Reviews.Author: Kathryn P. Foy "KatFoy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit for my elderly parents to check their e-mail and correspond with the family on the internet.Well, What A WASTE OF MONEY and TIME!!  The WI Fi connection would not 'recognize' their wireless network and the technical support is based in INDIA but people that are terribly hard to understand speak English!!How disappointing that something so 'reasonably' priced, compact sized, and seemingly perfect for Sr. citizens has such poor quality customer support.Don't waste you time or money...It's just NOT worth it!!Additionally, I think my clunky Cell phone preforms better than this thing does!!One VERY dis-satisfied customer!!

Reviews.Title: How slow can you go.
Reviews.Author: Greysquirrel "Greysquirrel"
Reviews.Content: I can't complain that I paid too much as I got it as a gift for sitting through an hour pitch from a travel agency try to get me to buy a travel package for four grand.Connecting to the internet was not a problem through my cable modem, but setting up the mail caused me some problem so I just went the web mail to pick up my messages, that worked well but so slow to open and then to open a message took forever, thought it had hung up it took so long. G mail was the same but could not open any messages. All web pages opened slow as molasses, thought I was back on a dial up connection. You Tube will only open from the desktop icon and not all films will play and the sound is dreadful. If you go to YouTube via Google you get a message that your browser is not recognized as it is too old. Keyboard is small and if you are used to a full size keyboard you may have a problem, if you text and are used to hunt and poke then you will be all right. I though I could take it will us when we go camping in our travel trailer as a lot of parks have WiFi but this thing is so slow I'm sure it drive both my wife and I both crazy.I haven't downloaded any patch from their web site as I am not going to use it, will probably sell it for $50 at a yard sale or Craigslist. Don't know about the fingerprint problem as I haven't taken of the plastic from the case or screen as I am not going to keep it. Forgot the sound was turned off on it when I got it, thought something was wrong till I went to system folder and turn the audio on, why they would ship it with not turned on is beyond me.If this unit was faster it might serve my purpose but being as slow as it is I could not tolerate it, it will have to go.

Reviews.Title: POS!!
Reviews.Author: J. Tongay "iowa mom"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this netbook for my 9 year old daughter for this Christmas. She was very excited to see it on Christmas morning! When we opened it and she started using it we found out that it DOES NOTHING!! She can't use her facebook except to see posts, she can't play any games, it doesn't even support youtube as it states on the box and has the application for youtube preloaded on the stupid thing!!! I have been calling electronic expo for over an hour and cannot get through to costumer service. I even got disconnected as if someone just cut my call off!I can't review this item on their site because IT WON'T LET ME!! There is no information about this product on their site, either, so I assumed it was a normal netbook...WRONG!! It is a PHONE APPLICATION that runs NOTHING!!I am assuming if and when I ever do get a hold of someone that they won't take it back as per their awful return policies! My bad! I definitely dropped the ball on this on for not doing more research...DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! IT IS A POS AND YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED!!!

Reviews.Title: Great First Elementary Computer
Reviews.Author: S. C. Luke "scase75 on ebay"
Reviews.Content: This computer was purchased for a 1st and 3rd grader.  It works great. They connect to their home network, play their favorite games at thier school site, and also download games from places like: disney.com and others.  The keyboard is just right for a 7 and 9 year old.  I recommend this to anybody for a first time computer for your child or grandchild.  My additional recommendations are; wireless mouse, sleeve or good carrying case.  My grandchildren are learning responsibility and know the consequences if they don't take care of their little netbooks.  They see middle and high schoolers that ride the bus with their school issued laptops. This teaches them how to be use their computer to pass the time, do homework, and get into the real world fast.  My daughter has set parent controls on their computers and limits their use and the content.  She supervises them and teaches them about certain sites that may harm thier computers.  Remember to add a anti-virus if you let your little ones go on-line.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: kay
Reviews.Content: I am very un happy with this . I purchase it for school not knowing how horrible old the technology was. They should list that it is a older version of labtop/netbook so customer could know.I wouldst not recommend anyone to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: unsatisfied
Reviews.Content: When I recieved the product, I was not able to get it to connect to the internet.  After getting some computer experts help I found out that the it was not compatable with my router.  I have sent three emails to the company with no reply.  I would not recommend this product or the company from which I purchased it(Elextronics Expo through Amazon)  This was to be a present for my daughter, I was unable to by her another in time for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!!! JUNK!
Reviews.Author: DeAnna Brown
Reviews.Content: Like other parents who have posted reviews, I purchased this for my 9 year old who loves to use the internet to play games. It worked great for 7 days. Now it will not get past the loading page and has green lines running through the middle. We have tried resetting it and nothing works. We purchased this at CVS for $[...] and while I did not expect it to have all of the bells and whistles of a regular laptop....I did expect to last more than a week. This has been an expensive mistake. Don't waste your time or money..spend a little more and get a qaulity product.

Reviews.Title: great laptop, but not for elderly or young.
Reviews.Author: techperson
Reviews.Content: Its a good computer, but its not for those with limited computer experience, that being said, its good for even basicly tech savvy kids.

Reviews.Title: Cherlyn's Reviews
Reviews.Author: cathcart2003
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these, got it in the mail yesterday, and didn't expect much for the low price that I paid, but at least I had hoped it would power up and last longer than 3 hours. I got it turned on, got it to connect to my home network for about 20 minutes, got disconnect and could not get it to reconnect to my home networking system even after sitting right in front of the router.Well like the saying goes, you get what you pay for....

Reviews.Title: A value for the brave-We are not all techies...
Reviews.Author: J. Timmers Sr. "AgentEmerald007"
Reviews.Content: Even in an effort to be brief, I was blessed to be a tech for a Fortune 500 in 1982 when the first IBM PC came out, or, the Apple II-e, prior to any Mac. I tend to think a lot of you if you may be reading this, if you were in grade school then, there was a joint *Gift* venture of some kind with my company, and Apple to put a *Black Apple II-e* in every grade school library, (Not the beige ones they sold). I am an oldster with back ground, but, at the same time, I bet Middle School kid would have done better than me. If you know how to find things called *DNS numbers* and *IP numbers* from your Internet Service provider, and, can figure out where to put them in the software in this little guy, it will work. It will connect to your wireless router. I am not sure what it would do at a *Hot Spot* on the road, I have never really used those places. It took me 5 hours to get it to fly, but it will do the things I want it to do, without question, which isn't a lot. There are at least a couple good YouTube discussions on what it *Will do*, but not how to set it up. In addition to what I *Know* it will do, I am *Fairly sure* I will be able to *Link it to my cell phone*, pay that provider as little as $15 / month for unlimited Internet. That is clearly a maybe at this point. Still, for $100 new, 1 year warrantee, and purchasing from someone reputable you can return it to if you are disappointed, it is well worth the price. Alternatives for *My uses* would have been about 3 times the cost... Thank / John +

Reviews.Title: MY NEW TOY!
Reviews.Author: The Queen "The Queen"
Reviews.Content: Tiny and so Cute; functional to check and send your emails not much else. Search capacity is limited; I keep it in my car and play games while I have time to kill and take it around to show-off. The screen is bigger than my "Smart Phone" so it works for me.Let me tell you how I came to buy this item. I purchased it for a gift in 2012 and it didn't work only would light up. The company (slip in box directs you to contact company and not the retailer where purchased) phone busy 24/7. So, back to the store they had one left. I get home it doesn't work at all; get refund. "Light bulb" time...try Amazon! Bingo! Not only did they have them but in "Red" one of my favorite colors! As the saying goes, "The Rest Is Herstory"!Peace,The Queen

Reviews.Title: surprised by return charges
Reviews.Author: don pinansky
Reviews.Content: bought for father in law who was too ill to sit at desk,  to use regular computer.he died while in transit so returned item un opened when it arrived.including return shipping and all the charges  i paid, it cost me $34.00 to return an item i paid $39.00 to buy.should have kept it .

Reviews.Title: I look at it...
Reviews.Author: Mystery person
Reviews.Content: I look at it like one of those really old computers that aren't very movable and great to have its probably a price of crap.

Reviews.Title: Waste of time and money
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 this "computers" from DEALSTOP. Bought it for my little girls as Christmas gift, so they wont bother me anymore on my big desktop with cooking and dress-up games. These two SYLVANIAs never get able to see my home wi-fi. Every effort to do something showed me next system error window on the screen. And product came with a sticker by device keyboard "Technical Support. Before returning to seller pls call" I'm keep trying to call there for about 6 weeks, but all I hear is answering machinne telling that all representatives are currently unavailable. 6 weeks!  So, dont be cooed and stay away from this scum product. Dont make my mistakes...

Reviews.Title: Disappointed, very
Reviews.Author: Amanda Koehler
Reviews.Content: Hi, please do not but this piece of junk known as the Salvania SYNET07526 netbook. I bought this cute little netbook from this site and believe me, it sucks, totally! First of all, I got an Internet connection on it but was unable to get online. So I played with it a little. Try to figure out what's what. Now, all the darn icons are lost and when I tried to download an update of the OS, the netbook did not read it. And I don't know what else to do about this. The seller who I bought it from got me an online tech but kinda afraid to call him therefore I don't think he can help me. So please do not buy think piece of crap if you know what's good for you. What I would suggest is one of those 7 inch Cruz tablets from Velocity. Or one of those tablets from iRulu.

Reviews.Title: What a piece of trash!!!
Reviews.Author: NWOasis
Reviews.Content: OMG!! A mom from my daughters cheer squad told me about this computer when she purchased it from CVS meant to be a christmas present for her 8 year old daughter.  I wanted to purchase on for my 10 year old daughter but I missed the sale.  So I was happy, when I saw it was a toysrus for $89 great price and I figured at toysrus I could also purchase a warranty.  Figured it would make a great christmas present for her, I went right out and bought it.  Got to my job took it out of the box to test it and was so underwhelmed.  I wasn't expecting the perks or feature of my own compaq netbook which runs XP and has a 250GB hard drive.  I just wanted something to surf the net and look at youtube.  This thing recognizes networks but I can't even get google to pull up.  Keeps saying there is something from with the site and DNS error.  I work in IT Production so I am no dumby when it comes to electronics.  This thing just doesn't work and it is that simple.  Wasn't expeceting the world just wanted it to do what it was advertised to do.

Reviews.Title: not a good netbook
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this netbook today at CVS for about $82.00 now,I knew this netbook was not a computer or a laptop and that was fine,however this device did not charge the full twelve hours,I started charging at 11:30 am and at 3:30 the light went out so I turned it on,it went to the OS page and said I needed a password,the keypad didn't even work,so tomorrow I am returning this and going to save my money to buy a inexpensive but good one from amazon or ask for one for Christmas whichever happens first. So in conclusion this device was horrible or maybe I got a used one

Reviews.Title: Failtop
Reviews.Author: peak oil god
Reviews.Content: I have one of these and i know alot about computers.this thing is fail.but it does work if you want 2 get online, and listen 2 music mp3s,great.but make sure you download the software from the manufactures website because it will turn into a paper weight.you also need an sd card at least 512.this thing is unstable but heres some advice DO NOT TURN IT OFF close the top and in 5-10 mins it will auto turn off.almost everytime iv turned it off it has froze power light stays on does not boot.if all else fails take the 2 screws on the bottom off and CAREFULLY with a flat head screw driver disconnect the little power connector on the battery from the main board.the battery does not come off it is built in.OKAY all bad aside it looks sexy WINDOWS CE is fail (IT WILL NOT RUN XP SOFTWARE)it won't run much of anything except what comes on it,must use internet explorer:(... internet purchasing/youtube/info great if your looking for everything this is definately not it but if your looking for fast web surfing (NOT GOOD FOR INTERNET VIDEO-PLUGINS ECT)good battery life and mp3 playback sound video files have 2 be processed it's cool.think of it as a big mp3 player that looks at webpages and youve about got it.

Reviews.Title: Great netbook, if you know what you're getting
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Listen people,If you expect MacBook pro performance for  a 150 dollar computer, you are insane.If you cant figure out how to use wifi, you dont deserve a computer this advanced (Not in performance, but in software Ease of use)If youve ever used windows, you'll be find.

Reviews.Title: exterior of item
Reviews.Author: aleem
Reviews.Content: i will not buy from this person exterior of item was in terrible condition like used . i ordered a new item and it was like a used item

Reviews.Title: This is cheap and bad
Reviews.Author: Lance213
Reviews.Content: I bought mine from this seller but it is defective it does not turn on but i did some research online and i found out that this netbook is slow as heck it runs on windows ce would be better if it came with windows xp edition i think it only has 128MB of ram which is a very small amount would be better if it had like 1 Gig or 512MB of ram and also it has 2GB of storage wgich i think is in a from of a pre-install SD card but there is a sd card slot for more storage i think up to 16GB or maybe even 32GB i have not try that out yet since mine is defective and there are 3 usb ports on there total 2 on one side and one on the back of the unit and there is also a headphone jack and a microphone jack which is both 3.5mm and this netbook also has wifi from what i have read online and looking at it specs which is nice and it also has a ethernet port on the back so you can use a wire internet connection if you don't have wifi and the internet is very slow it mostly load mobile version of web pages some web pages can load in full but mostly mobile version it also has youtube which is cool.
